content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment for electrical, plumbing, or HVAC needs. May I have your name to get started?
Why do you need my name? Just book an electrician.
I'm sorry, I need your name to create the appointment in our system. Could you please provide your name?
No, I don't want to give that out over text. Just send someone.
It looks like I’m unable to proceed without your name. I’ll get a human team member to assist you further.
reason: Customer refused to provide name after multiple requests.

content: Hi, this is Edgar from XYZ. For your appointment, we just need a first name to have the electrician dispatched and confirm any details. You don’t need to give a last name. Could you please provide a first name, or any name you'd like us to use for this appointment?
